data.name: qr_description
data.value: Once ye 'ave added this double lock key t' yer app o' choice, insert ye key below t' finish the setup process

data.name: qr_title
data.value: Here be yer Double-Lock QR code

data.name: backup_description
data.value: These keys will allow ye t' regain access t' yer account if ye ever lose access t' yer 2FA device

data.name: backup_description2
data.value: Save these keys somewhere 'cause otherwise ye may be locked out o' yer account

data.name: disable_2fa_description
data.value: T' disable double-lock authentication, enter a correct key from yer authenticator app.

data.name: 2fa_required
data.value: Ye be required t' setup Double-Lock 'cause o' yer role on this ship.

data.name: 2fa_description
data.value: Insert a valid Double-Lock key t' continue

data.name: 2fa_backup_description
data.value: Alternatively, ye can skewer {0}here{1} t' insert one o' yer backup keys
